pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Simulation and Scale-Dependent Analysis of Biodiversity Changes // Simulation, analysis and sampling of spatial biodiversity data (May, Gerstner, McGlinn, Xiao Chase 2017) doi:10.1111/2041-210x.12986. In the simulation tools user define the numbers of species and individuals, the species abundance distribution and species aggregation. Functions for analysis include species rarefaction and accumulation curves, species-area relationships and the distance decay of similarity.
